titleInfo.title: Christian Brothers College Salutes the Founders Circle: A Reception Honoring the 1978 Members

mods.abstract: President Brother Bernard LoCoco started the Founder's Club as a fund-raising effort. Membership was open to alumni, corporations, faculty, staff, and friends of Christian Brothers College. Contributions were based on the number of years CBC had been produced graduates, with a minimum donation of $1 per year.
